resources.string:
This life saving application will work on its best to keep you alert on the road by not letting you feel drowsy. 

1.You can add emergency contatcs on which notifications through messages will be sent.

 2.Place mobile in your car's phone holder in such a way your face is completely visible.

 3.Press'Start Detecction' button, it will begin to monitor your face features.

 4. Alarm will be generated on detecting drowsiness.

 5. Stop the alarm immediately.

 6. If Alarm not stopped withen 5 minutes emergency contacts will be notified.

 7. The person detection feature is to asist in detecting pedestrians and persons on the road.

 					STAY SAFE STAY ALERT
